description: Thureiretinam Balakumar alias Thureirathnam Balakumar v. Attorney General before Hon. B. Sasi Mahendran, J
parties: Thureiretinam Balakumar alias Thureirathnam Balakumar v. Attorney General
keywords: Abduction, rape, corroboration of evidence, leading question by the prosecution, which tarnish the credibility of the witness
legistation: Section 354 of the Penal Code, Section 364 (2) (e) of the Penal Code. Section 142 and 143(2) of the Evidence Ordinance
